transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan very good morning Amit ji baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Amit sir main Shailza baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART accounts team se. Actually aapka ek payment kal balance payment clear hona tha toh mere paas uski details abhi tak nahi aayi hai toh kya aapke paas aa gayi hai sir matlab aapne issue karwaya?
Customer: Gauri mam se baat kar raha hu na?
Executive: Nahi main sir waha se kyunki yaha pe kaafi saare statement aati hai aapke paas debit message aaya hoga na sir koi? Toh main puch rahi hu agar aapke paas aaya toh mujhe.
Customer: Bhej diya tha main.
Executive: Gauri ko bhej diya tha aapne? Ek minute. 
Customer: Unhe bhej diya tha unko maine.
Executive: Okay. Theek hai main ek baar Gauri ji se puch leti hu.
Executive: Aur baki sir abhi ye jo leads jo aa rahe hai kaun dekhega services ki aap dekhenge ya matlab koi person assign kar liya hai aapne?
Customer: Nahi main aur bhai dono hi dekh rahe hai boliye.
Executive: Aap aur aapke bhai kyunki sir hume catalog pe kaafi sara kuch karwana tha isme services wise. Toh abhi matlab Gauri toh abhi available nahi hai toh main unki manager se hi baat kar rahi thi.
Customer: Sir toh wo aapse discuss karke karna hoga na? IndiaMART ke paas pura ek saal hai.
Customer: Last one year hai ye agar main kya bol raha hu aap uski manager bol rahe ho ya koi bhi bol rahe ho. Ye bahut usse diya gaya hai wo Pallavi ji ko toh aapne hata diya kaise hat gaya wo mere ko pata nahi hai. Unke bolne pe maine kara diya. Laa. Wo hati hai ya department change hua hai mere ko nahi pata hai. Pallavi ji na pehle yaha pe?
Executive: Haan haan Pallavi ji.
Customer: Pallavi ji ke bolne pe chalo unhone jaise bhi mere ko bola ki sir main aise kaam kara ke dungi ye dungi. Catalog ka amount jaate hi Gauri ji ne ye bol diya tha ki Pallavi ji ne us department se Pallavi ji hat gayi hai ya kya hua hai main hi dekhungi.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Aur maine karne se pehle ye baat first time bol di thi ki ye IndiaMART ke liye last saal hai. Agar iske baad aap mere ko kabhi by chance pareshan bhi karoge na is saal ke baad agar mere ko kaam nahi aaya toh main baat nahi karunga aapse.
Executive: Sir dekho aap.
Customer: Ab wo jo dekho jo aapko kaam karna tha theek hai aadhe se jyada kaam toh maine karke khud bhi de diya hai. Kuch unhone kar diya hai ab wo baki ka ye sab wahi wo wala kaam ho gaya na ki payment aa gayi pending pada hai toh teen mahine ho gaye pada rehne do kaam aa raha hai nahi aa raha hai IndiaMART ko apni payment theek hai humne service renew kara di. Hamara job ka jo badhna tha wo badh gaya ab agle ka bhad mein jaaye company uska hoga nahi hoga. Maine ye cheez pehle bol ke chalu kiya tha last saal hai ye. Uske baad aap chahe kitni khushamad karna aapke manager senior manager koi phone kare mere ko us baat se koi matlab nahi hai.
Executive: Nahi toh actually dekho sir aap bilkul aapki baat genuine hai main mana nahi kar rahi but sir dekho kabhi kabhi agar employee.
Customer: Nahi aapke paas theek hai sir batao. Jo mere ko apni taraf se kaam karna tha aap website open karo aapko khud ye pata lag jayega ki ye bande by leads purchase kar rahe hai nahi kar rahe hai usse work ho raha hai nahi ho raha hai wo saari cheeze pata lag jayengi.
Executive: Nahi ho raha na tabhi toh main aapko bol rahi hu aur abhi starting mein aapne payment dekho mere paas aapka jo balance amount hai wo reflect nahi kiya hai details actually kya hai har har department mein na.
Customer: Haan bol rahe ho na ki kaam nahi ho raha hai. Main abhi aapko performance bata deta hu dekhte kitne toh mere ko by leads aapse dikhe hai. 2000 itni maine by leads purchase kar liya hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi ek baat suniye sir.
Executive: Sir aapko batau aapke paas pata hai mera ye jis number se main baat kar rahi hu na aapke paas ye save bhi hoga. Meri aapse baat 2023 mein hui thi.
Customer: Ye toh IndiaMART helpline number hai.
Executive: IndiaMART helpline number zarur hai but ye mera mere paas bhi aapki company thi sir pehle 2023 ki baat kar rahi hu. 2023 mein meri aapse baat hui thi jab aapne ye services band karke haan.
Customer: Main aapki baat suno. Ab aap ye dekho February ke andar 2025 mein 294 inquiries thi.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Theek hai abhi meri services renew kab hui hai ye mere ko mahina mere ko bhi yaad nahi hai kab matlab ye laga lo. Teen mahine ho gaye honge lagbhag.
Executive: Teen mahine nahi hue sir services live hai abhi August mein hi end mein aapki service aayi toh September aur October.
Customer: Fir bhi baat maine toh maintain kari hai toh do. Haan toh ab do mahine ki wo dekho by leads. 95 inquiry maine us time pe 76 by leads kari hai.
Executive: Ek cheez ek cheez batau sir aapka jo ye payment tha na star aur MDC aapne karwaya tha ab aapne wo services ka pura payment nahi kiya toh 25 August ko aapka payment hona tha toh 25 September aur 25 October tha toh aapka jo check tha wo bounce hone ki wajah se aapka promotion already sir pata hai kitne chaar din ye aur paanch din wo pure 10 din kyunki 31 din the October mein pure nau din se aapki services hamper thi aur catalog mein main khud kaam karana chahti hu aur pata hai aapki jo category jisme aapne star liya hua hai na wo automatic change ho jati hai agar aap lead consumption nahi karte ye mild steel bolt aur mild steel hex bolt mein aapne liya hua hai na sir star? Toh isme aapko jyada se jyada product add karne hai.
Customer: Aap dekhoge toh aap dekhoge consume kaise nahi ho rahi hai main khud bol raha hu mam. Pehle main ek bhi nahi le raha tha ye dekho April mein jaoge 27 hai usse pehle 40 hai by leads kaha purchase kar rahe the wo toh maine bolne ke baad abhi purchase ho rahe hai na 95 ho gayi 75 ho gayi October ke andar.
Executive: Hmm hmm. Toh performance report dekh ke bata rahe hai na.
Executive: Main sir pehli baat suno main ek kaam kar deti hu aap main main ek cheez kar deti hu sir first of all toh na aap kis time pe available ho paoge aaj ya kal kabhi bhi?
Customer: Main toh available busy hu mam aap apna pehle. Main aaj ke liye bol raha hu main abhi bhi available hu aap apna pehle account mein check kar lo ki aapki payment aa gayi hai agar uske baad aapke paas time hai toh aap beshak abhi call kar lo mere ko koi issue nahi hai.
Executive: Theek hai main sir ek kaam karti hu main aapko ek ek ghanta dijiye main mere toh ye jo number hai na main aapko bhi whatsapp kar rahi hu apne number se aap mujhe jo details aapne ki thi process wo whatsapp kar dijiye baki main ek ghante ke andar aapko dobara connect kar rahi hu aur aap system pe aana sir online aap system pe online aa sakte hai?
Customer: System pe baitha hu abhi. Abhi sir andar main system pe hi baitha hu.
Executive: System pe main na aapka main sir Vivek ji hai ek team mein kyunki Gauri matlab itna thoda mujhe lag raha hai jo matlab kyunki uska case usse nahi handle ho raha pa raha tha ye aapka hai na toh main ek Vivek hai team mein ek gents ko appoint kar rahi hu kyunki last time aapka Pallavi aap keh rahe wo bhi lady thi theek hai aur wo toh khair dusre department mein move ho gayi hai toh Gauri ki jagah main thoda high specialized person ko de rahi hu kyunki aapki services bhi star ki hai theek hai wo jo apna maximizer wale jo client hote hai unka promotion jyada achhe se dekh paate hai toh main Vivek ko aapka catalog assign kar rahi hu aur unki senior main hu theek hai. Mere se hi aapki baat hui thi 2023 mein maine hi aapka case uthaya tha fir uske baad main maternity leave pe chali gayi thi toh fir mera bhi dusre department mein transfer ho gaya tha aur ab dobara aapka case aaya hai yaha pe theek hai toh main isme proper jo cheeze karani hai na pehle toh catalog ka score improve karana hai. 14 product aise hai jisme photo nahi hai theek hai sir aur aapki kuch.
Customer: Mam suno meri baat ye jo photo dalne ka kaam hai na. Aap photo aap doge?
Executive: Aap photo aap doge?
Customer: Maine pehle se hi de rakha hai Gauri ko dalne wala kaam hai usme dalne mein batao kitna time lagta hai.
Executive: Sir dijiye aapne photo.
Customer: Ab photo toh unko ek baat bolo main dekhna padega kab bheji thi ye toh. Ab main aapko dikhata hu dekho. Aapke paas aapke paas message mein photo hai. Itne itne product hai aap na mam time dekhoge na aap dekhoge usme mild steel hex bolt ki images hai. Mere mild steel hex bolt ke kam se kam usme 25 item add honge toh wo koi si bhi photo aap utha ke pick karke usme dal sakte ho.
Executive: Abhi yaha pe aath dikh rahe hai sir.
Customer: Koi nahi aap mam karke dekho main aath ke bhi bata dunga ab toh photo kya main net pe dikhaunga na usme ki ye item hai ye dekho same item ye hai same dimension ke alag hote hai mam usme. Mam usme se do teen toh out of stock hai ye jo 78 rupees per kg wala hai na M24 M20 aur M27.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Ye toh aapne out of stock kar rakhe hai.
Customer: Mam kar rakha honge main mana nahi kar raha hu kaun kaun se kar rakhe hai mere ko bhi dekhne padenge kaun kaun se item hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Sir video meeting main abhi main Vivek ko bulati hu sir Vivek se aapki video meeting karati hu theek hai aap mujhe bas aadha ghanta de sakte hai 12:30 baje kar lu aapko connect pehle main aapki payment dekh lu wo hi nahi aayi hogi toh services activate karani hai na mujhe wo abhi block padi hui hai abhi bhi services aapki.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai aap bhejo whatsapp pe main aapko detail dal dete hai.
Executive: Haan abhi whatsapp kar rahi hu aapko sir.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's payment not reflecting in system.

- Catalog work pending, Pallavi replaced by Gauri.

- Claims services not up to par, wants resolution.

- Dissatisfied with IndiaMART's services.



Resolution:

- Executive will check payment status.

- Executive will connect with Vivek for catalog.

- Executive shared her WhatsApp number for details.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to share payment details on WhatsApp.

- Executive to reconnect in an hour.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- payment, catalog, services, byleads, support
